rows.label: bf11240100_0010
rows.name:
Things are looking dicey.
Baltrich is getting desperate.

rows.label: bf11240100_0020
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf11240100_0030
rows.name:
And it's looking like the Pope's
support for you is wavering.

rows.label: bf11240100_0040
rows.name: It has nothing to do with you.

rows.label: bf11240100_0050
rows.name: Then why are you here?

rows.label: bf11240100_0060
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf11240100_0070
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hehehehe...

rows.label: bf11240100_0080
rows.name: Here.

rows.label: bf11240100_0090
rows.name: I never knew this place existed.

rows.label: bf11240100_0100
rows.name: Only myself and His Holiness know about it.

rows.label: bf11240100_0110
rows.name: This is the quintessence of my ancestors, the Judicium.

rows.label: bf11240100_0120
rows.name:
That said, the device itself was salvaged
from the depths of the Cloud Sea.

rows.label: bf11240100_0130
rows.name: It's likely from the fabled Land of Mors.

rows.label: bf11240100_0140
rows.name: Mors?

rows.label: bf11240100_0150
rows.name: Look.

rows.label: bf11240100_0160
rows.name:
This is a diagram of the materials
that make up human cells.

rows.label: bf11240100_0170
rows.name: And this one belongs to a Blade.

rows.label: bf11240100_0180
rows.name: They're remarkably similar.

rows.label: bf11240100_0190
rows.name:
Naturally. They both originate from humans.
That part isn't so surprising.

rows.label: bf11240100_0200
rows.name: However...

rows.label: bf11240100_0210
rows.name: It's identical.

rows.label: bf11240100_0220
rows.name: Calm yourself.

rows.label: bf11240100_0230
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]adlib astonishd gasp

rows.label: bf11240100_0240
rows.name: Is... is that a Core Crystal?

rows.label: bf11240100_0250
rows.name:
Correct. A Blade's Core Crystal doesn't
just contain human data.

rows.label: bf11240100_0260
rows.name:
It also has schematics recorded for the materials
that make up all kinds of animals.

rows.label: bf11240100_0270
rows.name:
So you're saying that Blades hold the life data
of every living creature?

rows.label: bf11240100_0280
rows.name: That's not all.

rows.label: bf11240100_0290
rows.name:
This is still an undifferentiated part,
but look at this.

rows.label: bf11240100_0300
rows.name: This part is from a Divine Beast.

rows.label: bf11240100_0310
rows.name:
This indicates that this undifferentiated section will,
in time, evolve into a Divine Beast.

rows.label: bf11240100_0320
rows.name: Fascinating... This is truly the word of God.

rows.label: bf11240100_0330
rows.name: The word... of God...

rows.label: bf11240100_0340
rows.name:
Yes...
It's what you've been searching for.

rows.label: bf11240100_0350
rows.name:
I want to get to the bottom of this.
I want to know what God's plan for this world is.

rows.label: bf11240100_0360
rows.name: And to seize that knowledge and make it mine.

rows.label: bf11240100_0370
rows.name: And His Holiness feels the same way?

rows.label: bf11240100_0380
rows.name: Who knows.

rows.label: bf11240100_0390
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf11240100_0400
rows.name: This is what you want too, isn't it?

rows.label: bf11240100_0410
rows.name: Alright. I'll lend you a hand.
